Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and unparalleled quality, it's truly worth every penny of its $8,000 value to you. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory special price of $7,200. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-value item at a significant discount. I believe this offer presents a fantastic value proposition for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
